scripts.build: npx rimraf ./src/generated && npx mkdirp ./src/generated && npx protoc --plugin=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto --ts_proto_opt=outputServices=grpc-js,env=node,useOptionals=messages,exportCommonSymbols=false,esModuleInterop=true --ts_proto_out=./src/generated -I=proto proto/*.proto
scripts.build-win: npx rimraf ./src/generated && npx mkdirp ./src/generated && npx protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts_proto=.\node_modules\.bin\protoc-gen-ts_proto.cmd --ts_proto_opt=outputServices=grpc-js,env=node,useOptionals=messages,exportCommonSymbols=false,esModuleInterop=true --ts_proto_out=./src/generated -I=proto proto/*.proto
